entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The text mentions 'The Goblin's Revenge', indicating that a goblin is involved in the story. The description does not provide further information about the goblin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He ventures out to find sustenance under the Invisibility Cloak but returns empty-handed after encountering dementors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story. He protests Harry's inability to make a Patronus and expresses disappointment when Harry returns empty-handed.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: The text mentions that Ron expects Harry to be able to make a brilliant Patronus, indicating that it is a spell or charm that can be cast by wizards.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that glide out of the mist in the distance and cause Harry to feel ashamed. They are described as unnatural and frightening.

relationships.description: Harry is unable to make a Patronus, which is expected of him by Ron.
Dementors cause Harry to feel ashamed and frightened.
